text: Pleopeltis murorum is a species of fern in the family Polypodiaceae. It is native to parts of Central and Southern America (Costa Rica, Hispaniola, Colombia, Venezuela and Ecuador). Under the synonym Polypodium mixtum, it was regarded as endemic to Ecuador and threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Polypodiaceae Category:Flora of Colombia Category:Flora of Costa Rica Category:Flora of Ecuador Category:Flora of Haiti Category:Flora of the Dominican Republic Category:Flora of Venezuela Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pleopeltis murorum
